message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a competitive price of $150. I believe it offers significant value, even at that price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $150 is a fair reflection of the product's value, I'm willing to come down to $130. This is my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but $130 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $110. Can you consider that?
